description:
Keep things simple and stay open to possibilities. These performance pants let you move freely for climbing or doing yoga. The fabric is so light you can roll them up and whip them into a pocket of small corner of your pack. Knit cuffs let you adjust the length and the fabric wicks and

  • 100% recycled polyester stretch ripstop with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish
  • Stretch-knit waistband and cuffs
  • Drawcord at waist
  • 2 drop-in front pockets
  • Single back zippered pocket
  • Articulated shaping at the knees for a range of movement
  • Reflective logo
name: Patagonia Terrebonne Joggers - Men's
